title: Welcome to Ontos
tagline: Manage business glossary, data contracts, data products, personas, and more

search.placeholder: Search for data products, glossary terms, contracts...

overview.title: Overview
overview.noData: No overview data available for the selected feature previews or your permissions.

complianceTrend.title: Compliance Trend
complianceTrend.noData: No compliance data available for the selected period.

noAccess.message: You currently don't have a specific role assigned.
noAccess.contactAdmin: Please contact an administrator to request access to the application.

requestRoleSection.title: Roles
requestRoleSection.description: You currently have no application roles assigned. Select a role below to request access and get started.
requestRoleSection.info: After submitting a request, an administrator will review it and you will be notified of the decision via the notification bell.

discoverySection.title: Discovery
discoverySection.selectDomain: Select a domain to view its hierarchy and filter products.

createDataProduct.title: Create Data Product
createDataProduct.description: Use the wizard to define a new data product.

defineDataContract.title: Define Data Contract
defineDataContract.description: Create or update a technical contract.

createDataset.title: Create Dataset
createDataset.description: Manage datasets for matching and mastering.

createSchema.title: Create Schema
createSchema.description: Create or manage schemas and permissions.

requiredActionsSection.title: Required Actions
requiredActionsSection.alertMessage: This list shows only action-required notifications assigned to your role(s).

marketplace.tagline: Welcome to the Data Marketplace. Discover, understand, and subscribe to data products and datasets.
marketplace.searchPlaceholder: What can we help you find today?
marketplace.searchDatasetsPlaceholder: Search datasets by name, path, or contract...

products.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter.
products.noSubscriptions: You haven't subscribed to any data products yet.
products.browseToSubscribe: Browse the Explore tab to find products to subscribe to.
